reviews.review:
Increible juego, para ser un juego que salió en 1998 aún mantiene su estética
Su historia es increible y algo que creo que muy poco se utilizaba en su época, 
y además es un clasico por mas que pasen los años siempre sera un exelente 
=========================
EL VISTO BUENO

=Creanme este juego merece mucho la pena, aunque sus gráficos son basura (en nuestra época), en su tiempo eran revolucionarios
=Por mas que pase el tiempo seguirá siendo muy bueno

==========================
EL VISTO MALO

=Después de algúnas horas te va a empezar a doler la cabeza por la velocidad y por las imagenes tan parpadeantes que tiene, pero descanza algunos minutos o horas y se te pasará
=Es muy bueno, pero algúnas partes son increiblemente difíciles (las cuales tuve que pasar con chetos... pero nada mas)

==========================
¿Alguien sabe contar hasta 3?

Por lo que se ve a valve se le olvidó que llevamos casi 10 años a la espera del Half-Life 3/ Episodio 3 da igual
Y siempre que entrevistan al "dios de las rebajas" Gabe Newell dice: El método de los episodios no nos terminó de convercer y lo dejamos a un lado, otra: Estamos mejorando las mecánicas... y el clásico: Lo estamos desarrollando... a este paso van a parecer a los creadores de Duke-Nukem, desde 1998 en "desarrollo"... no vas mal valve... no vas mal...

Y lo mismo está pasando con L4D 3, van por lo mismo...
É antigo, but nostálgico
Nice
Es un juego impresionante e impresicindible
Quel plaisir de jouer à un jeu qui ne semble ne jamais finir. Et les vieux graphismes font plaisir à revoir
I Love this game.

win7完美闪退

Half life,
My first playtrough of this game is in 2017. Nineteen years after the release.
This game has amazing level designs and is very fun to play.
Ofcourse if you compare this with games from now, half life wouldn't stand a chance but for back then it was great!
It looked a bit like Doom but with a story. 
You had some awesome weapons and enemies.
The game can be a bit hard, I played it on medium difficulty and I got stuck a few times because of enemies or because I didn't know where to go.
You need to backtrack a lot and then can be hard to find out.
But the game is awesome and I would pick it up when it is in sale.

Everything about Half-Life smacks of quality: the storyline, the gameplay, the graphics, the sound effects and last, but not least, the obvious level of committment Sierra and Valve have invested in it. Half-Life is, without doubt, the best PC game I have ever played. Ever.

El mejor juego de Shooter que he jugado hasta ahora. Se los recomiendo mucho, vale la pena comprarlo
Não gastaria dinheiro num jogo destes.

PROS

+ Fast paced, old-school FPS gameplay
+ Story doesn't get in the way of gameplay
+ Interesting concepts 
+ Gun sounds and sounds in general are great

CONS

- Enemies are all hit-scan for the most part, so it's hard to avoid damage
- Guns do not go where you shoot them at all 
- Enemies take too much damage compared to how much damage they can do to you
- Platforming sections are annoying
- Part where they take all your guns away from you


It's a mixed bag. Personally I couldn't get past the enemies having god tier accuracy but you can stand right next to a guy, unload half a magazine, and not kill him. It's not even recoil because I can understand that, but the guns just don't shoot straight for some reason. It's a pretty big deal in a shooting game to have the shooting part be satisfying and I just didn't like the shooting in this game. Aside from that though, it's decent but there's so many other shooters out there I can't recommend this game unless you want to play it for historical purposes.


SCORE

6/10
Sou apaixonado por toda a série Half Life! Este é um clássico que todos deveriam jogar!

Игра безусловно шедевр для своего времени! К сожалению в те годы я не имел возможности поиграть в нее за неимением компьютера и вот спустя почти 20 лет после релиза я наконец таки прошел ее. Не могу сказать, что меня игра особо зацепила, если бы я поиграл в нее на старте релиза или хотя бы в начале 2000-х, то наверняка Half Life стала бы моей одной из самых любимых игр. Сейчас она мало кого способна чем то удивить, разве что только хорошей сюжетной линией. Так что повторюсь, игра безусловно хороша, но время ее прошло и теперь это лишь просто огромная и довольно значимая часть истории видео ировой индустрии.

J'ai découvert ce jeu grâce à Portal mais si vous avez acheté aucun jeu de cette grande histoire voici mon conseil. Achetez Half Life, Half Life 2, Half Life 2 Épisode 1 et 2, Portal et Portal 2 et faites les dans cette ordre. Vous allez voir le shéma de l'histoire sur la téléportation qui est formidable! 

Sinon le jeu, un 100% et j'ai extrèmement envis de prendre le remake tellement j'ai adoré!

LEGENDARY, ULTRA, HYPER EXCELLENT, SUPERB, MEGA ALFA SUPER EXTREMELY OVERWHELMINGLY PERFECT. That's how I define this game, it was the one that introduced me to the universe of videogames, and on the instant I stepped off of that train in Sector C for the first time, I knew that this game was THE game. Completely worth it.

No całkiem fajny shooter pierwszoosbowy, przeznaczony dla jednego gracza z kampanią fabularną. Jest to pierwsza część legendarnego Half-Life'a, którego wszyscy, którzy grali czekają na epizod 3 czy po prostu kolejną odłonę z tego uniwersum.  No przeszedłem gierę bo chiałem to sprawdzić i powiem że bawiłem się... umiarkowanie. Nie chodzi mi o to że jest to zła gra, przechodziło się dobrze, ale z czasem nużyła. Tutaj nie ma tego ,,czegoś'' co sprawiło jak w pierwszym FarCry'u, że chciałem grać więcej i więcej. Ciężko jest mi wystawić ocenę gry (ale pozostałych rzeczy już tak: grafika 6/10, fabuła 7/10, gameplay 9/10), ale skoro nie ma oceny pół na pół i nie mogę powiedzieć że zawiodłem się na tym tytule to... [h1]no cóż chyba mogę polecić[/h1]

Classic.

A blend of challenging and treacherous missions, amazing story, original concepts that were executed flawlessly, and great narrative. That being said, the Source engine is unforgiving, and at these early stages of the engine, you'll be getting frustrated when the game itself doesn't seem to want to cooperate. You'll be dying a lot, but the end result is more than worth it.

Half-Life .. Half-life never tires.
Half-Life is a game that you want to go through again and again, coming up with new ways of passing.
10/10 cascade resonances.

So I think I have an interesting angle on this review- Half-Life came out when I was two, and back then I was more interested in playing with the slimy things I found in my nose than any PC game. Now, at the age of NOT a baby, I picked up the game and gave it a look.

I'm quite pleased to say that, yes, this game lives up to the hype. The controls are solid, the story is phenominal, even the graphics hold up surprisingly well, and I'll be damned if killing those lightning throwing bastards isn't one of the most cathartic things I've done in years.

If you're like me, and Half-Life predates your ability to play video games, I highly recommend you pick up a copy, and see what you missed.

Nunca había jugado la campaña del half llife, me fascino, por mas que sea un juego viejo aun resalta en calidad de historia y la manera en la que debes resolver puzzles. esta bueno para pasar el rato y la historia es muy buena mas 10 perro : )

I rate the game 10/10

I finally got around to playing this famous classic when it went on the summer sale. I won't say that I wasted two dollars, but this game was an enormous disappointment. I don't care that the graphics suck; of course they would on an old game. That's not an issue. The issue is that the plot makes no sense and the gameplay isn't very good. 

The whole premise is just a run-of-the-mill "we scienced too hard, and now bad things are attacking, and you're the only one who can stop them!" But then suddenly the military is involved and they know your name for no apparent reason, and then this weird dude with a breifcase, like, removes you from the world or something. It doesn't make sense, and then when you look up someone explaining it on the internet, it's still wholly unfulfilling as a storyline.

Then there's the gameplay. First and foremost, the movement mechanics are ABYSMAL. Holy shit, I haven't been that frustrated with just trying to walk around since I played Ocarina of Time (which is a good game, but early 3-D was hell). It's especially annoying given how many jumping puzzles there are. Nothing stands out as special, and I found myself spending hours hiding behind doors taking potshots at yet another of the same enemy until it finally died. And for fuck's sake, how many times did they think I would still find it interesting to turn a blind corner and "Ha HA! A headcrab was hiding there! Bet you never saw that coming! Have a few points of basically unavoidable damage again! ISN'T THIS GAME A CLASSIC?!"

Yeah, not impressed.

Pros-
Fun gameplay
Alright story
Classic Game
Combat

Cons-
Parkour: You can tell this game wasn't meant for platforming your guy slides everywhere
Difficulty: There are some difficulty spikes like when you first get on the surface and it can get annoying
Lifeless maps: Not much is going on in the background and it really feels calm even though there is kind of a war going on

Very classic game, I would say it is still a fun experience even today, if you are looking to play original half life then get this, but if you are expecting a story driven game then this is not really going to be that. There isn't much of a narrative and most of the time you really don't know why you are doing what you are doing. All in all I think that if you are just looking for a classic game then get this, otherwise if you are looking for a more story driven game then get Black Mesa.

the only reason this game has a positive review is the storyline. There are some bugs too and when you dont know where to go, but since its source its really easy to cheat (open console ~, sv_cheats 1, god, noclip)

Just finished Half Life and wanted to write a review. Wow, Im deeply divided on this.

On the one hand the level design was pretty nice, the story interesting, environments good, graphics are alright, sound is ok, but soundtrack isnt anything special though. 

On the other, controls felt awkward and caused a lot of deaths, in most situations the game tries to take you by surprise and it often feels it gets cheap kills (if yore low on HP, you may die from falls that are scripted, if you dont have grenades in some ares youre screwed, etc), some of the weapon functionality isnt explained, for example, only at the end I realised that if the laser sight is on the rockets will mimick your movements when launched (Lord, that was a pain in the ass), how some other weapons worked I didnt understand at all. The game creates an environment where you will get killed a lot unless you know the layout of the missions and know well how to use controls and weapons. Being careful, attentive and having good reflexes will often be not enough if youre playing this for the first time, there is often little room to maneuver on the spot. Its basically challenging you to play it again. Thing is, there is not much incentive in this day and age to play it again once you beat the story.

Even though this game made me frustrated quite often, I will give it a positive review, considering its a 20 years old game and, what was the deciding factor for me, I really liked the end credits music after you finish the game. )))

All in all, it is a good game.

But be warned, you should only get this in the bundle with the rest of the franchise and on sale. The price is way too big for todays standards.

I got through it and it's not how i remember last playing this, most of my time was spent trying to get out walls i got stuck in through no fault of mine at all and the ladders and rope climbing are atrocious to climb, jump off and jump on. it's been nothing but trouble from the start, i like trouble it's one of the reasons i bought the game but there is a few annoying things that meant my playthrough is getting constantly interrupted.

the autosave checkpoints could of done with a little more frequency between saves, getting through those crushers and trying to avoid getting burned alive and ripped apart i would prefer not to repeat several times, places around the map that could of done with some extra auto save points.

the last part of the game with all the wall problems i am facing i'v had to literally resort to manual saving after every jump and action, thats obvious not how it's supposed to be played but thats the way i had to do it.

for the most part i can give it a thumbs up, just be aware of the few problems in the game.

[i]After 18 Years It still holds up[/i]
one of the best single player experiences i ever had.

Pros:-
-Amazing Atmostphere 
-has Aged Well
-huge campaign (took me 15+ hours to complete through the campaign)
-nice storyline
-attention to detail
-perfect amount of challenge
-no microtransactions, quick time events, or other unnecessary Bull Shit

-MODS
-some gameplay depth
-good characters
-fun and arcadey gameplay
-Great Soundtrack

Cons:-
-some bugs 
-multiplayer almost dead
-some first person platforming issues (some say this were fixed in the source version, but the source version has its own flaws)

This Game Still Haunts Me, it also gives me hope that if gordon can survive all that i can survi\ve some too.
in short this game is a CULT CLASSIC and a must play for any pc gamer.

An honest review:
I wasn't around for when this game first came out so I don't have any nostalgia for it or any emotional attachments as many people do. So this review is unbiased. I have to say though it's a pretty awesome game. The graphics aren't that great but other than that everything else is pretty solid. Story is good and the gunplay is straight up awesome. I can understand why this game is considered a classic.
